title: Finally uninstalled
body: It feels great to know that I don't have to live in pain anymore. It was a joke I literally had to add people that were fucking shit in order to simply avoid risking being on the same team as them, the ranked system is fucking shit. How people get into diamond and up with negative win loss ratios is just beyond me, especially the ones that play at a fucking gold level. gg 0ce, hf being absolutely nothing for the remainder of this games existence. cya cunts.

replies.body:
I honestly don't get why people make these posts. Do you think people care? 
No. Your probably just another flamer who will no doubt re-install League and make another more competent players life hell.
Gj
You talk  too much shit. Get that checked out.
If you live in pain because of video games then I am severely confused. How can someone's life be so good that losing on a video game is what drags them down?

league man, it gets to people...
gets you when your weak and makes you suffer

Uninstalled league to make this board's post at a diamond level.

Yet posted on a level 5 account.

Logic/10

So your saying he made a Smurf account and still is bad@lol?
Wonder what his other looks like?
ur a pussy m8 a real man would of turned into a toxic overlord and abused the autismos every game until perm banned
well done, commendable effort. your life will be so much better
